ReviewButton: Review the information collected before packing the .fossity file.
ExportButton: Export an encrypted .fossity file with the collected information and fingerprints.
UploadButton: Go to fossity.com and upload your file. You will receive an email with the quotation! If we don't hear from you, your .fossity file is erased after 48hs
AttachKnownSBOM: If you already have an SBOM, please attach it here. It provides useful context for the auditing team. (only json files allowed: SPDX, CycloneDX)
AttachIgnoreSBOM: You can attach an SBOM including the list of components you donâ€™t want to see in the audit results. Useful for finding underlying compliance issues in Open Source software. (only json files allowed: SPDX, CycloneDX)
AttachKnownSoftwareCompositionHint: Enter here the list of known Open Source components in order to enhancement audit results
